summary: Page 80 (book page 100) covers sections סד through ע. Seven sections captured correctly, with section ע properly marked as continuing to next page. Column order (right then left) is correct. Some text accuracy concerns, notably section סח has a '(?)' uncertainty marker and section סז has a source_ref issue.

issues.description: The OCR text 'אמנם וכו׳ אז בודאי עצמו עושה לו משמרת למשמרת איכא בהאי עלמא' seems to have accuracy issues in the middle part. Some words may be misread.
issues.original_text: אמנם וכו' אז בודאי עצמו עושה לו משמרת למשמרת איכא בהאי עלמא.

issues.description: OCR has 'על מדינו דברים' - the word 'מדינו' appears to be a misread. It should likely be 'מידיו' or 'מדעתו'.
OCR has 'גם כעוה"ז' - the כ (like) should be ב (in), reading 'גם בעוה"ז'.

issues.location: section סז, source_ref and makor text boundary
issues.description: The makor text ends with 'ומגדלות' which is actually the first word of the source reference. The source_ref 'מרקחים, פסח' should be 'מגדלות מרקחים, פסח' and the word 'ומגדלות' should be removed from the end of the makor text.
OCR has '(?)' uncertainty marker in 'שכר ו (?) לא יקופח' which indicates the OCR was unsure of a word. The correct reading is likely 'שכרו לא יקופח'.
issues.original_text: שכר ו (?) לא יקופח בהאי עלמא

issues.description: OCR has 'אשר יבדו מלבם שמירה יתירה' - 'יבדו' is unclear. May be 'יבדו' (invent) or 'יבדה'. Needs verification.
